abstracts.cdata!:
This Results Profile talks about
            restoring livelihoods in Croatia. Fifteen years after the
            end of hostilities in Croatia some people still lived in
            areas where roads, buildings and the water supply were
            destroyed and the land was littered with mines. Jobs were
            scarce. The Social and Economic Recovery Project created lot
            of job opportunities. Social and economic cohesion had also
            improved along with trust among different groups, which
            resulted in community driven, bottom-up and people-centered
            development in the country.
